message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000.  This price reflects the quality and potential of the product. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective.  While I'm willing to be flexible, $16000 doesn't quite cover the value I place on this product.  How about we split the difference and settle on $18000?  This would give you a significant saving compared to my initial price, while still acknowledging the unique qualities of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, but $18000 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $17000?
